About Home Plate Diner Home Plate Diner is a Fast Food restaurant located at 3515 50th St in Lubbock, TX 79413. Home Plate Diner has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
